text: læa xallxhˌ nan khux phuthrng chwyhelux brrda phu thi sraththa doy thrng na phwk khea xxk cak brrda khwam mud su sængswang læa brrda phu ptiseth sraththa nan brrda phu chwyhelux khxng phwk khea k khux xad-dxkhut doythi phwk man ca na phwk khea xxk cak sængswang pi su khwam mud chn hela ni hæla khux chaw nrk doythi phwk khea ca xyu nı nrk nan tlxd kal
